titleStmt.title: The comical history of Francion wherein the variety of vices that abuse the ages are satyrically limn'd in their native colours, interwoven with many pleasant events, and moral lessons, as well fitted for the entertainment of the gravest head, as the lightest heart / by Monsieur de Moulines, sieur de Parc ...; done into English by a person of honor.
Vraie histoite comque de Francion. English
titleStmt.author: Sorel, Charles, 1602?-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Leach, and are to be sold by Richard Lowndes ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Charles Sorel. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reissued with "The most delightfull and pleasant history of Francion."
A different translation from that published in 1703.
